Time Range"},"input_IP":{"options":{"defaultValue":"","token":"ip"},"title":"IP Address","type":"input.text"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"contain","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://6308dbe939893f1fb04d2795"},"backgroundColor":"#1434A4","showTitleAndDescription":false,"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_lblDNSLog","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":97,"w":100,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblRemoteSAConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":50,"y":148,"w":230,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblSoftwareConnection","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":195,"w":210,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblFileHashMatch","type":"block","position":{"x":80,"y":248,"w":180,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblAccountLogin","type":"block","position":{"x":90,"y":296,"w":160,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_lblLogStack","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":346,"w":130,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_lblNetworkConnections","type":"block","position":{"x":60,"y":45,"w":220,"h":45}},{"item":"viz_imgDNS_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":90,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgSA_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":140,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_gpDWAuhB","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":190,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgFileHash","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":240,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgAccountLogin","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":290,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgLogStacking","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":340,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_OCotLkX0","type":"block","position":{"x":300,"y":30,"w":880,"h":830}},{"item":"viz_imgNetwork_Connections","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":40,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_imgAboutThisDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_imgSearchForDashboard","type":"block","position":{"x":1170,"y":0,"w":30,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_lblAboutThisPage","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":0,"w":160,"h":44}},{"item":"viz_Cq7mfbY2","type":"block","position":{"x":960,"y":0,"w":220,"h":44}},{"item":"viz_sASDphQn","type"
